content: CFP-ES Endo-Shield High-temperature endothermic mat for passive fire protection of critical cable circuits, fuel lines, communication systems and many other MEP systems ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop collars, wraps and bandages- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Endo-Shield is the industry’s first LBP (Low Bio Persistent) endothermic mat for passive fire protection. Low bio persistent materials allow fibers to easily clear from the lungs compared to ceramic fibers, resulting in a safer non-carcinogenic product for the installer Faster, easier fire protection – high flexibility and low weight makes Hilti endothermic mat a more efficient solution, especially for small diameter pipes Helps to lower total installed cost – this simpler method can translate to significant labor and time savings on-site compared to traditional fire protection solutions Safer jobsites – Hilti endothermic mat is made using non-carcinogenic LPB fibers, removing a common safety hazard for installers Extensive third-party performance verification – tested to ASTM E1725 for circuit integrity and UL1489 for fuel pipe protection Applications Fire protection of critical infrastructure, circuits and Distributed Antenna Systems (DAS) which should remain operational under fire conditions Protecting fuel oil piping from fire – such as for backup generators Fire protection of large membrane penetrations – such as recessed electrical boxes/panels in rated barriers, fire extinguisher cabinets or medical gas box outlets Increasing the T rating of conduit, EMT or pipe penetrations – such as through floors in electrical, data or mechanical rooms For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimension (L x W): 20 x 2 ft Thickness: 0.5 in Weight: 54.4 lb. Technical Data | Thickness | 0.5 in | Weight | 54.4 lb | Application temperature range | 14 - 122 °F | Application temperature range (with sealant) | 35 - 104 °F | Color | silver/white | Density | 32.6 lb/ft³ | Storage and transportation temperature range | -4 - 122 °F | Material Type | Low Bio persistent fibers (non- carcinogenic) ### ITEMS- 2331829 - CFP-ES Endo-Shield 1 roll - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFP-ES Hilti Endo-shield - 3774579 - CFP-ES Endo-Shield mat - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x CFP-ES Hilti Endo-shield
